Chapter 6

6.3.8 Sholinganallur

Figure 6.15: Sholinganallur in 2002
Source: (Jayaraman, 2015)
Sholinganallur has witnessed local land-use change drastically in the areas between
the Old Mahabalipuram Road (OMR) and the Buckingham Canal. The OMR, a multi-
lane raised road, has been constructed in an order that cuts across the drainage
path of waters headed to the Buckingham canal.
